transArray.content:
The food in the restaurant is very rich, like it!
The waiters didn't clean up the mess in time, and couldn't sit at a suitable table every time they came, so they had to ask someone to clean up and wait.
Also, the coffee served at breakfast was horrible! burnt! It's still a very old coffee pot, which doesn't match the hotel design at all. There is not even an ordinary hotel coffee machine, it is almost a bit tuned, not trendy!
